article_title: Physicians Hail Senate Passage Of 'Doc Fix' As Value-Based Care Takes Hold

article_metadata.description: The U.S. Senate, following last month’s bipartisan action by the U.S. House of Representatives, tonight overwhelmingly passed a repeal of Medicare’s controversial sustainable growth rate formula. The vote, by a whopping 92-8 vote in the Senate, will avert a 21 percent cut in Medicare payments to doctors while at the same [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
